channel.title: Client Fail shutdown (YT VID)
channel.description:
Please watch and help me im very sad and another question
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g7Df7R4LhqU
the other question:
When i log on, and logg off,and then the client shuts down, i try to log back on, then it says "invalid username and password" and i know its the right password, so i go into characters, change the password, and it still doesnt work!
please help with both questions!

item.title: Client Fail shutdown (YT VID)
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Ok i heard alot of people try to run 317 Client’s on a windows 7 computer and when they walk around it crash’s this should help alot it works 100% for me

  1. Ok First you need to download this - http://uppit.com/v/REKLK274

2.Open that up and click Windows 7 Coverter

3.Then You will see a line that says ( Batch File: ) Click the ( … ) on that line then a brows will pop up and go to your client folder and click your .bat that you use to run your client.

4.Then push compile.

5.Now your done! go back to your client folder and if you have a windows 7 computer you can play 317’s now and it wont crash the client.
or you can try a youtube video for a youtube method, some guy just posted that… or you can try this.

Read full topic
